data.title: Kevin & Perry Official
data.meta_description: Kevin & Perry Official are available for 90s, 00s and Ibiza Themed Weekends, performing a mash-up DJ Set and meet and greet!
data.text:
BIOG

Kevin & Perry Official have been in the entertainment industry for over 25 years!

Now they are available for 90s, 00s & Ibiza Themed Weekends, DJ Sets, and Meet & Greet Photo Opportunities!

If you remember Kevin and Perry Go Large in Ibiza – then you’ll understand what this is all about! From ‘Big Girl – All I Wanna Do Is Do It’, the duo will have the room dancing with Mash-Ups and Mega-Mixes from the 90s and 00s!

A viral video of the Kevin & Perry duo has over 11 million views! The clip gained so much traction that Kathy Burke, who played Perry in the 2000 hit film Kevin & Perry Go Large, noticed it. She tweeted: “If I wasn’t so much older and wider I’d swear this was me! Lovely stuff.”

“I have genuinely never seen two people look and act so alike. This is crazy,” tweeted one viewer.

“Literally would have 100% believed this was Kathy and Harry. Fair play to these legends,” another echoed.

“WOW! This is insane. It’s as if they were separated at birth lol,” someone else voiced.

They are available for all kinds of bookings, whether it be a Festival, Theatre, Events, Holiday Parks, Product Launches, Shopping Centres, Corporate Functions, Hotel Events, 90’s & 00’s Themed Weekends, Ibiza Themed Events, or just a party!

It will be an event that will last a lifetime in the memory of all who meet these iconic fictional ravers, as they impress and amuse in equal measure!

N.B. Kevin would like to remind you, “I’m not your SLAVE!!!!” and Perry would like Jam Sandwiches on the Rider, “Yes Please Mrs Patterson, Thank you!”
